extendedInfo.description: The Jawbone app helps you stay on top of your schedule, battery life, and callsâall hands-free using your Jawbone headset or speaker.Jawbone 2.0 replaces previous versions of Jawbone Companion: * Agenda: Jawbone whispers through your headset or speaker and reminds you about upcoming meetings and events when they're starting; it will even dial you into conference calls at the press of a button, passcode and all. * Prompts: Preview custom voice prompts and languages to personalize your Jawbone device. * Battery Meter: A convenient battery indicator on your phone lets you know; at a glance, how much battery life your speaker or headset has left. * Instant Info: Press the TALK button on your headset, JAMBOX, or BIG JAMBOX to hear upcoming events, remaining battery life, and the current time.  For MINI JAMBOX, you can customize the PLAY button to access voice control or dial a contact.  * LiveAudio: Toggle LiveAudio on and off from the application (JAMBOX, BIG JAMBOX, and MINI JAMBOX only).Jawbone currently supports Jawbone ERA, ICON HD, ICON, JAMBOX, BIG JAMBOX and MINI JAMBOX.  Make sure to get the latest update from jawbone.com/start and enable JawboneLinkâ¢ in Advanced Settings if itâs not enabled already.To hear calendar announcements with meeting titles, please make sure a TTS engine is installed by going to Settings > Voice input & output settings.For more information about the Jawbone app and Jawbone products, check out jawbone.com/startNote: the Android Robot is reproduced from or is a modification based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.

reviews.comment: Had to uninstall multiple times because of no phone audio at all. Finally reinstalled then shut down and restarted phone and app now works... Should not have to do this....
reviews.author: Mike Smith

reviews.title: App is not working
reviews.comment: There is no connectivity with the app even though the sound is connected. Overall jambox is awesome, just get the app to prefom just as well.
reviews.author: Oli Guajardo

reviews.title: Can\'t log in, no connect
reviews.comment: Samsung G2, Jawbone ERA, just downloaded app, signed up w new account. Bluetooth connects fine, jawbone works but when i try to use app first it won\'t connect, says network not avail. Then if it does log in it won\'t connect.
reviews.author: Chris Graham

reviews.title: Fundamental issue
reviews.comment: App won\'t connect even though I\'m happily playing music from my phone via bluetooth. And yes I\'ve activated the link function on the box.
reviews.author: Todd Bray

reviews.title: Good Companion
reviews.comment: Connected right away and is working great. Glad they updated the app. I had previously uninstalled because it seemed so dated. Would be nice if since you log into your account that you could see your colored jambox in your app.
reviews.author: Robert DeCaul

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Regardless if the music is actually playing through the Jambox , it seems unable to find the device.
reviews.author: Andy Wilkes

reviews.title: No connection since update
reviews.comment: Can\'t connect since updating to the current version on HTC one. Plays fine just no software features.
reviews.author: Glen Host

reviews.title: Connect issues
reviews.comment: It probably would be a good app if it would recognize that my Bluetooth is connected to my phone. If it will work I\'ll improve my rating.
reviews.author: Michelle Junior

reviews.title: Fabulous system.
reviews.comment: Absolutely love my jambox speaker. Wished I would have sprung the extra $100bucks for the big jambox, I just couldn\'t wait. Even through it did go down in price after I got it last year and could have gotten the big jambox if I had been a little more patincent,  still no regrets and absolutely incredible system and with this app even better.
reviews.author: Robert Elrod

reviews.comment: Bad post the new update . doesn\'t even recognise the connected blue tooth ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer connects to my Jawbone.
reviews.comment: Upgraded the app and now it won\'t see my Jawbone.  Logging in just to turn on my Bluetooth is asinine! Downgrade or delete are now the options.
reviews.author: James Machado

reviews.title: Works Nice
reviews.comment: This app works nice with my Jawbone bluetooth ear piece.. Anyone having issues probably needs to go to Jawbone website on they\'re computer, connect there device (ear piece, jambox, etc) to USB port, and update your devices software..
reviews.author: Duane Stepherson

reviews.title: Don\'t buy a jambox
reviews.comment: Long story short I bought a jambox and it was broke.( internal wiring issue creating leaving noises amongst other issues) returned it got another broken one 3 times until warranty ran out. When it works it\'s cool. But read forum posts these things aren\'t the best quality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on my Samsung SG3 not on my Nexus 7.
reviews.comment: For a Bluetooth headset with 2 processors and accelerometer to not work with the Nexus 7... OK I get the idea that I can\'t make calls but my Era doesn\'t work with Skype or Tango on the SG3 and won\'t load on the Nexus.   You need the asp on your phone, just hope Aliph decide to support tablets, too.
reviews.author: David Moskowitz

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: New update. I don\'t have a red Jambox. I\'d like the ability to customize it to show the black Jambox.
reviews.author: Reggie T

reviews.title: This app doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This is bs, I have paired the device and am using it but this god awful app is not picking it up and no matter what I do it wont pick it up.
reviews.author: Jessamy Julian

reviews.title: Weird and confusing
reviews.comment: For one, the battery only shows my Era at 85% after an overnight charge. Also have no clue how the agenda part is incorporated.
reviews.author: Dustin Halter

reviews.title: From 4 to 3 Stars with Latest Update
Jawbone companion does it again
reviews.comment: Jawbone is the best Bluetooth I\'ve ever used and the new improvements to the companion only makes it that much better
reviews.author: Kris Stevens

reviews.title: Change it back!
reviews.comment: They updated it and now it won\'t let me sign in! Claims no network when I have full signal
reviews.author: Corey Tate
